text:
Meet the woman behind Tito Ortiz! With her outspoken personality and brutal honesty, the UFC Hall of Famer’s longtime girlfriend Amber Nichole Miller will be making waves on the upcoming season of WAGS LA.

Read more: http://www.eonline.com/shows/wags/news/886760/wags-la-s-amber-nichole-miller-is-excited-to-show-off-her-relationship-with-ufc-hall-of-famer-tito-ortiz
title: WAGS LA’s Amber Nichole Miller Is Excited to Show Off Her Relationship With UFC Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz
